issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Use PartitionSchemeDiscovery in DataSourceDiscovery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7366](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7366). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5950 introduces `PartitionSchemeDiscovery`, but ideally it would be supplied as an option to data source discovery and the partition schema automatically discovered based on the file paths accumulated then.
